Name: Thomas' Tales
About the game: The game starts with Thomas after the cat follows his brothers kidnapped by a mysterious creature, entering a dark portal. Now Thomas faces a magical and different world, corrupted by dark magic. Inspired by adventure and exploration games, the character must learn the magic of this world to survive the dark side of this universe. Explore these fantastical environments in search of Thomas' brothers, but beware of the obstacles and traps it has. Combat enemies through the spells cast by the Magic Scepter. While exploring Dungeons, the player will go through puzzles and enemies to find the Grimoires of magic. The player will also be able to craft items to help with mana and life. During explorations, the player will find puzzles he'll have to solve to collect different objectives.
